invocations.description: Returns true if your character is protected by mana shield, false otherwise.
invocations.ex:
auto(200)
if not $manashielded then
	cast('utamo vita') wait(300, 500)
end
invocations.exDescription: Each 200 milliseconds, it will check if you are mana shielded. If not, it will cast 'magic shield' spell.
